data.actual_result: The menu expands but the last to boxes have no text
data.short_description: [iPad only] Holding a message then closing the keyboard caused the text of buttons to disappear
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Click the chat bar, as if to type a message - Hold down on the message you sent before and wait for the menu to appear - Close the keyboard with the button in the bottom right
